A year ago today, an lbw decision cost Scotland a place in the World Cup - ahead of the West Indies - and $1 million. It was one of the most costly defeats any cricket team has suffered in years.

text: Duanne Olivier, who had a stellar start to his Test career with South Africa, now wants to play for England. International cricket needs more central funding - a minimum wage for all Test cricketers, to start with - to ensure that all teams can pick their best players.
author: timwig
